import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Container, Card } from "react-bootstrap" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import Workout from "../components/Workout" import { listWorkouts } from '../actions/workoutActions' import Loader from "../components/Loader" import Message from "../components/Message" ///WILL BE CONTINUED!!! const WorkoutListScreen = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const workoutList = useSelector((state) => state.workoutList) const { loading, error, workouts } = workoutList useEffect(() => { dispatch(listWorkouts()) }, [dispatch]) const deleteHandler = () => { console.log("delete") } return ( ( <>

Workout List

{loading ? : error ? {error} : ( <> {workouts.map(workout => )}
ID DESCRIPTION DATE PRICE
{workout._id} {workout.name} ${workout.price} {workout.category}
)} )) } export default WorkoutListScreen
